CQ1.query: Show me the list of courses in department Computer Science along with their locations (building and room_number) for the Fall 2023 semester.
CQ1.sql: SELECT course.title, section.building, section.room_number FROM course JOIN section ON course.title = section.course_title WHERE section.semester = 'Fall' AND section.year = 2023 AND course.dept_name = 'Computer Science';

CQ2.query: List all the course titles in the Computer Science department along with the number of semesters each course is offered.
CQ2.sql: SELECT course.title, COUNT(section.semester) AS section_count FROM course JOIN section ON course.title = section.course_title WHERE course.dept_name = 'Computer Science' GROUP BY course.title;
